title: An Act relative to increasing the fine for handicap parking violations for city/town implementation and compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Ayers of Quincy, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3614) of Bruce J. Ayers relative to increasing the fine for handicapped parking violations.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Transportation
